publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3050# Robin Harper: Priorities, Actions and Targets for Sustainable Development—That the Parliament notes the publication of the Executive’s priorities, actions and targets for sustainable development and the significance of this in light of the forthcoming World Summit on Sustainable Development to be held in Johannesburg later this year.
S1M-3050# Priorities, Actions and Targets for Sustainable Development (lodged on 30 April 2002) Tommy Sheridan*, Donald Gorrie*

S1M-3050# Robin Harper: Priorities, Actions and Targets for Sustainable Development—That the Parliament notes the publication of the Executive’s priorities, actions and targets for sustainable development and the significance of this in light of the forthcoming World Summit on Sustainable Development to be held in Johannesburg later this year. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Donald Gorrie
S1M-3050# Priorities, Actions and Targets for Sustainable Development (lodged on 30 April 2002) Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-3050# Priorities, Actions and Targets for Sustainable Development (lodged on 30 April 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*
